data.eml:eml: A new species of Hyphessobrycon Durbin from northeastern Brazil: evidence from morphological data and DNA barcoding (Characiformes, Characidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Guimaraes, Erick Cristofore, Brito, Pamella Silva De, Feitosa, Leonardo Manir, Carvalho-Costa, Luis Fernando, Ottoni, Felipe Polivanov (2018): A new species of Hyphessobrycon Durbin from northeastern Brazil: evidence from morphological data and DNA barcoding (Characiformes, Characidae). ZooKeys 765: 79-101, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.765.23157, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.765.23157
